long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the quirky and educational world of Baldi's Basics with our new Chrome extension! 🎮📚 Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the game, this extension brings all the fun and challenges right to your browser, even without an internet connection.

Introduction:
Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning is a unique game that blends classic 90s edutainment with creepy horror elements. The game revolves around a student trying to collect seven notebooks scattered throughout a school while avoiding the clutches of Baldi, a strict and somewhat unsettling teacher. What sets Baldi's Basics apart is its blend of nostalgia, humor, and unexpected scares, creating a gaming experience like no other.

How to Play:

Install the Extension: Click "Add to Chrome" to install the Baldi's Basics extension. Once added, you'll see the icon in your browser toolbar.
Start the Game: Click on the Baldi's Basics icon to launch the game. No internet? No problem! The game runs offline seamlessly.
Collect Notebooks: Your main objective is to find and collect seven notebooks hidden throughout the school. Each notebook contains math problems you need to solve to proceed.
Avoid Baldi: Baldi will chase you down if you answer questions incorrectly or take too long. Use items like soda cans and chocolate bars to slow him down or speed yourself up.
Explore and Survive: Navigate through classrooms, hallways, and other areas while avoiding other characters like the Principal, Playtime, and the Bully, each adding their own twist to the gameplay.
Features:

Offline Play: Enjoy the full game without needing an internet connection. Perfect for playing on the go!
Easy Access: Quickly launch the game from your browser toolbar.
Nostalgic Fun: Relive the charm of 90s educational games with a spooky twist.
Challenging Puzzles: Solve math problems and use strategic thinking to outsmart Baldi and his friends.
Dive into the wacky world of Baldi's Basics today and see if you have what it takes to collect all the notebooks and escape the school! 🏫🧮👾 Download now and start your educational adventure!
